name: Printers
description: Printers is a printer server configuration tool. It supports most printers and can automatically detect the printer of current network, making the print service more convenient.

en_US.description: Printers is a printer server configuration tool. It supports most printers and can automatically detect the printer of current network, making the print service more convenient.
en_US.name: Printers

zh_CN.description: Printers是一款用于配置系统打印机服务器的工具。它支持大多数打印机的使用，可以自动检测当前网络上的打印机，让打印服务变得更加便利。
zh_CN.name: 打印机
